verses.verse: A Psalm of David. O Jehovah, who shall abide in Your tabernacle? Who shall reside in Your holy mountain?
He who walks uprightly and works righteousness, and speaks the truth in his heart.
He does not go about slandering with his tongue, and does not do evil to his friend, and does not lift up a reproach against his neighbor.
In his eyes, the ones being refused have been despised, but he honors those who fear Jehovah: He that has sworn to his hurt, and will not change it.
He has not given his silver at interest, and not has taken a bribe against the innocent one; he who does these things shall not be shaken forever.
